Package org.radarbase.management.web.rest

Class AuditResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.management.web.rest.AuditResource
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/management/audits")
public class AuditResource
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for getting the audit events.

      • getByDates

        @GetMapping(params={"fromDate","toDate"})
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit.AuditEvent>> getByDates​(@RequestParam("fromDate")
                                                                                                                             java.time.LocalDate fromDate,
                                                                                                                             @RequestParam("toDate")
                                                                                                                             java.time.LocalDate toDate,
                                                                                                                             org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
                                                                                                                      throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        GET /audits : get a page of AuditEvents between the fromDate and toDate.
        Parameters:
        fromDate - the start of the time period of AuditEvents to get
        toDate - the end of the time period of AuditEvents to get
        pageable - the pagination information
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of AuditEvents in body
        Throws:
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException

      • get

        @GetMapping("/{id:.+}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit.AuditEvent> get​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id)
                                                                                               throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
        GET /audits/:id : get an AuditEvent by id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the entity to get
        Returns:
        the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the AuditEvent in body, or status 404 (Not Found)
        Throws:
        org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
